class app.py.neopixels.NeoPixels(led_count=60, max_brightness=255, pin=18, max_watts=1, watts_per_60=18, grb=False, testing=True, flipped=True)¶

Control access to Adafruit_Neopixel()

check_power_usage() → float¶

Recalculate power usage

Parameters: None

Return: power usage

get_brightness() → int¶

Get current brightness

Parameters: None

Return: brightness

get_pixels() → list¶

Get pixel data

Parameters: None

Return: list of pixel data

get_power_usage(refresh: bool = True) → float¶

Return current power usage

Parameters:

refresh: If true, update value before returning

Return: power usage

info() → dict¶

Get information about these neopixels

Parameters: None

Return: neopixel information

num_pixels() → int¶

Get number of pixels

Parameters: None

Return: number of pixels

set_brightness(value: int) → int¶

Set strip brightness

Parameters:

value: new brightness value

Return: brightness

set_gamma(data: list)¶

Set gamma array used for gamma correction

Parameters:

data (lenth 256): values to remap brightness to

Return: None

show(limit: int = 0)¶

Update pixels with data in led_data if sufficient time has passed since last update

Parameters:

limit: how many ms to wait between shows

Return: None

update_pixels(data: list)¶

Update led_data with given pixel data

Parameters:

data (length led_count): list with pixel data to update with

Return: None
